short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access all Unicode characters to copy/paste them wherever you feel like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unicode characters include Emoji, Dingbats, Miscellaneous Symbols and many more.
